Lyric:
[by:JulianJayden]
[00:18.34]I used to believe
[00:20.84]We were burnin' on the edge of somethin' beautiful
[00:25.56]Somethin' beautiful

[00:30.22]Smoke and mirrors keep us waitin' on a miracle
[00:34.73]On a miracle
[00:36.94]
[00:37.64]Say, go through the darkest of days
[00:40.49]Heaven's a heartbreak away
[00:42.79]Never let you go, never let me down
[00:47.10]Oh, it's been a hell of a ride
[00:49.97]Driving the edge of a knife
[00:52.48]Never let you go, never let me down
[00:55.69]
